COUNCIL:
What is your vision for the municipality of the above Council? (maximum 50 words)
Restore Casey's pride as a dynamic, progressive, and liveable council, through proactive
participation of ratepayers in governance, reduce wasteful spending to lower rates and fees,
support local businesses to grow economy & jobs, enhance safety and order, create more
recreational facilities, & promote more multicultural interaction through council
initiated/supported events

What expertise or attributes do you have which would help you in undertaking the role of Councillor?
Provide details (maximum 50 words)
My extensive academic training and corporate experience in client management and human
resource administration, as well as my natural and acquired social and people skills.
